headline: Dividend Hike and Bond Offering Might Change the Case for Investing in AvalonBay Communities (AVB)
summary: On November 19, 2025, AvalonBay Communities announced its Board of Directors declared a US$1.75 per share cash dividend for the fourth quarter of 2025 and completed a US$399.82 million fixed-income offering through the addition of multiple co-lead underwriters. The simultaneous dividend declaration and substantial bond deal highlight the company's commitment to maintaining shareholder returns while actively managing its capital structure through diverse market participation. We'll consider...
